price: Yeroo Shu’ayb isaaniin jedhu: “sila Rabbiin hin sodaattanuu?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum shuʿaybun alā tattaqūna
